lines.text:
[playing bass fiddle, a passerby drops a 'coin' in his cup]
Thank you, Merry Christmas.
[a rich passerby drops a lot of 'coins' in]
Oh! Thank you! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
[Mickey and Pluto run off, he chases after them]
My good man wait! I want to buy your dog!
No no! I won't sell him to you, he's my pal!
Yes but I will pay you handsomely.
No no! I won't sell him to you I tell you, he's my pal!
